name: Distant Worlds: Universe
notes:
After this installer completes, you will need to launch Steam and install the game manually.

After installing the game, in a terminal, browse to where Steam is installed and run sudo chmod -x steamapps/common/Steamworks Shared/_CommonRedist/DotNet -R

If you are missing music, try installing mplayer.

task.app: ie6 dotnet35sp1 dotnet40 steam gdiplus wmp9
task.name: winetricks

content:
game:
  appid: 261470
  arch: win32
installer:
- task:
    app: ie6 dotnet35sp1 dotnet40 steam gdiplus wmp9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: false
wine:
  version: 5.0
